name: Tet9 (Lachlan Kingsford)
description:
This has not been released because it is finished, or good. It has been released because I spent a few hours a couple of years ago making something that I thought would be interesting, and it turned out, it wasn't.

This is an experimental prototype about whether playing 9 little tetris games at once with the same controls would be fun. 

It turned out, it wasn't. But maybe it'll be interesting, give you an idea, let you experiment, or just quickly let you know that it didn't work.

Use arrows to move, and Z and X to rotate blocks. Game over is not implemented - you need to restart the application.

No support is given.

Source is also provided, in a completely unchecked-unpruned way.
